name: react-icons
description: SVG React icons of popular icon packs using ES6 imports
author: Goran Gajic

scripts.build: node ../../node_modules/copy/bin/cli.js ../../README.md ./packages/react-icons && node ../../node_modules/rimraf/bin.js ./lib && node ../../node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && node ../../node_modules/renamer/bin/cli.js --find js --replace mjs ./lib/* && node ../../node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p ./tsconfig.commonjs.json && node scripts/build.js
